unnormalised: **Auto Buzz: New Wheels Hit the Indian Roads!**
normalised: **Auto Buzz: New Wheels Hit the Indian Roads!**

unnormalised: Namaste, auto enthusiasts! Buckle up because this week saw a flurry of exciting vehicle launches, making Diwali season even brighter.
normalised: Namaste, auto enthusiasts! Buckle up because this week saw a flurry of exciting vehicle launches, making Diwali season even brighter.

unnormalised: First up, Maruti Suzuki unveiled the 'Agni' mini-SUV, promising fuel efficiency and a price tag that won't break the bank (starting at Rs. 6.5 Lakhs ex-showroom Delhi). Dr. Sharma from ARAI lauded its safety features.
normalised: First up, Maruti Suzuki unveiled the 'Agni' mini-S U V, promising fuel efficiency and a price tag that won't break the bank (starting at rupee six point five lakhs ex-showroom Delhi). Doctor Sharma from A R A I lauded its safety features.

unnormalised: Tata Motors also joined the party, launching the 'Nexon EV Max' with an extended range of 450 km on a single charge. Perfect for those long drives to your *gaon*.
normalised: Tata Motors also joined the party, launching the 'Nexon E V Max' with an extended range of four hundred and fifty kilometer on a single charge. Perfect for those long drives to your *gaon*.

unnormalised: Meanwhile, Mahindra showcased a glimpse of their upcoming off-roader, tentatively named 'Thar Adventure Edition'. Expect rugged styling and go-anywhere capabilities.
normalised: Meanwhile, Mahindra showcased a glimpse of their upcoming off-roader, tentatively named 'Thar Adventure Edition'. Expect rugged styling and go-anywhere capabilities.

unnormalised: And not to forget, a Bangalore-based startup, 'Rev Motors', launched its first electric scooter with a massive 100 sq ft. storage space. Perfect for carrying all your *puja* essentials!
normalised: And not to forget, a Bangalore-based startup, 'Rev Motors', launched its first electric scooter with a massive one hundred square feet storage space. Perfect for carrying all your *puja* essentials!

unnormalised: Stay tuned for more updates and detailed reviews soon. Happy driving, and Jai Hind!
normalised: Stay tuned for more updates and detailed reviews soon. Happy driving, and Jai Hind!
